content: IBM z14 ZR1 or IBM z15 T02 systems)  Crypto Express7S, Feature Codes 0899 (one adapter on card) and 0898 (two adapters on card), carry forward only (MES from z15 systems) 1 CPACF enablement feature must be ordered (FC 3863). Chapter 6. Cryptographic features 207  Crypto Express8S, Feature Codes 0909 (one adapter on card) and 0908 (two adapters on card) For more information about the Crypto Express8S feature, see 6.5, “Crypto Express8S” on page 215. Finally, a TKE workstation is required for entering keys in a secure way into the Crypto Express8S HSMs, which often also is equipped with smart card readers. For more information, see 6.6, “Trusted Key Entry workstation” on page 230. The feature codes and purpose of the cryptographic hardware features that are available for IBM z16 A02 and IBM z16 AGZ are listed in Table 6-1. Table 6-1 Cryptographic features for IBM z16 A02 and IBM z16 AGZ Feature code Description 3863 CP Assist for Cryptographic Function (CPACF) enablement This feature
